description:
In the popular MMORPG world 'Union' there existed a legendary party. Its name was Subaru. This party, made up of a group of childhood friends and elementary schoolers, exceeded the limits of the game with their various senses. However, due to an incident which resulted in a death, 'Union' ended its service and the group of childhood friends went separate ways... 6 years later, high schooler Haruto logged into the new 'Reunion' and reunited with a single girl. Asahi—one of old 'Subaru' party members, and his childhood friend who should have died 6 years ago. Is she a digital ghost, or...?

(Source: NU)

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

name.native: クライヴ＝ヴィヴァリー

node.description:
Currently freelance he resides in Tokyo. Yoshioka is a member of the Writers' Guild of Japan and the Television and Radio Writers' Association of Japan.

[Website](http://www.takawo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/takawoy) | [Twitter 2](https://twitter.com/takawoyy)

[Website](https://www.universal-music.co.jp/petit-milady/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/petitmilady) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXMlgSrADF3FEkbW5CEHj8g)

__Members:__ [Aoi Yuuki](https://anilist.co/staff/101686) & [Ayana Taketatsu](https://anilist.co/staff/101996)

A voice actress duo unit. Together, they have performed the opening and ending themes for various anime, including the song "Kagami no Dual-ism", which was used as the third opening theme to [Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal II](https://anilist.co/anime/15489/), the song "Azurite", which was used as the opening theme for [The Pilot's Love Song](https://anilist.co/anime/19117/), the song "Seishun wa Tabemono desu", used as the opening theme for [Pan de Peace](https://anilist.co/anime/21315/), the song "A or A!?", used as the opening theme for [Alice or Alice](https://anilist.co/anime/99638/).

The name of the unit is a reference to the fact that Aoi Yuuki and Ayana Taketatsu are small (their heights are 144.5 and 151 cm respectively) and cute girls.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/遠藤麻未)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [background artist](https://anilist.co/staff/201516/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/johnsama) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/75255)

Noted for his work in the [Sword Art Online](https://anilist.co/anime/11757/) franchise.

Married to fellow animator [Haruko Iizuka](https://anilist.co/staff/105678/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/124182562)

An extremely prolific animator often appearing in dozens of shows yearly.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [other animator](https://anilist.co/staff/224143/)._
__Yui Miyabe__ is a Japanese animator, who does in-between animation.
__Kasumi Soukoto__ is a Japanese animator, who does in-between animation.
